bioghist.p: The Board of Managers of Swarthmore College, a body made up of 35 members, is responsible for managing the financial resources of the college, selecting the President, and establishing policies related to academics and the governance of the college. Stephen Girard Lax, Swarthmore College class of 1941, was Chairman of the Board of Managers from 1971 to 1976. Lax was also Chairman and President of SGL Industries, Inc. Theodore Friend was president of Swarthmore College from 1973 to 1982.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of records of the Swarthmore College Board of Managers, chiefly papers of Stephen G. Lax, Chairman. Records include minutes and reports of the Board and its committees, including the Investment, Nominating, Development, Instruction and Libraries, Student Life, and Property Committees; correspondence; financial reports; statistical records of enrollment and admissions reports; subject files on organizations and people; materials related to alumni giving campaigns; and records related to the Swarthmore Afro-American Students Society. The collection also contains records of Theodore Friend related to the Board of Managers, including financial reports, and minutes of various committees of the Board of Managers.
